properties.title: Software Development Coordinator
properties.info: I managed a team of Developers building the world's first open source Legislative information Managment system
properties.organization: UN/DESA Africa i-Parliaments Action Plan Project

properties.title: Consultant, Parliamentary Processes
properties.info: I helped startup the Africa i-Parliaments Action Plan project
properties.organization: UN/DESA Strengthening Parliaments in Africa Project

properties.title: Analyst Programmer
properties.info: I started my working career in a cubicle here in 1996. The work was tough, but I learnt a lot. We built the Sales Forecasting module for India's first indigenously developed ERP Product

properties.title: Consultant
properties.info: I moonlighted as a free-lance Consultant and did projects in the Legislative, Health Information and Hospitality sector. I met my wife while implementing one of these projects

properties.title: Consultant - Business Software Systems
properties.info: I started working for Symphony who were the parent company of Impact Consultants - and I was the first employee at the Software projects division of the Company. We did amazing work in the East African region with limited resources.

properties.title: Consulting Systems Engineer
properties.info: I moved to Kenya and worked as a BaaN ERP implementer in this small consulting outfit. But life was tough and the company folded up in a couple of years.
